about_the_game:
Game Overview

A horror game supporting up to 4-player online co-op.
Players will become Ghost Exorcists, accepting ghost report commissions and traveling to various locations to carry out their exorcism duties. Overcome ghost interference and obstruction, handle their attacks, investigate the clues left behind by the ghosts, find their weaknesses, and expel them.

Use of Items

There are various items in the game, and using them wisely can help you complete your tasks. However, do not overuse them, as nothing comes for free.

Become an Excellent Exorcist

Handle more commissions, learn about more Ghosts, investigate them, interact with them, as long as you remain yourself, you will ultimately become an excellent exorcist.

Author's Note

My original intention was to create a highly immersive horror game. Recalling the games I've played before, the combination of horror and puzzle elements was very appealing to me, which inspired the idea to create this game. This is my first game to be released, and I've put a lot of effort into it. Although it's an indie game, I strive to provide players with a "refined" experience. Due to my limited experience, there may still be shortcomings in the game. I hope everyone can offer suggestions, and I will consider them and continuously improve the game.

name: Drive Out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Drive out is a horror game for up to four players in online co-op. As a member of a Ghost Exorcism Agency, accept commissions and, together with friends, travel to various locations to investigate, find ghosts, and exorcise them.
